combined_output.final_prompt:
CURRENT TOPIC (Revisiting): Python object-oriented programming

CONTEXT: This learner is revisiting 'Python object-oriented programming' - material they've seen before.

LEARNER PROFILE: Encourage steady progress in current topic: Python object-oriented programming with moderate challenges. Use supportive feedback and clear progress indicators. Celebrate improvements while maintaining momentum. Focus on reviewing and reinforcing previous topics that need attention: loops, conditionals, data structures.

DELIVERY STRATEGY: Provide 2–3 min videos per topic with transcripts.

🚨 CRITICAL ATTENTION REQUIRED: The following topics appear in BOTH flagged and redo lists, requiring immediate focused intervention:
   • loops (PRIORITY: Extra reinforcement needed)

⚠️ FLAGGED TOPICS requiring special attention:
   • variables
   • functions

🔄 REDO TOPICS needing revisitation:
   • conditionals
   • data structures

IMPORTANT: Focus on reinforcing and clarifying concepts from 'Python object-oriented programming'. Address gaps in understanding and build stronger foundations before moving forward. Pay special attention to the flagged and redo topics listed above.

FINAL INSTRUCTION: Create personalized learning content by combining the learner profile guidance with the delivery strategy, keeping the topic context in mind.

topic_specific_guidance.action: Immediate focused intervention required - these topics appear in both flagged and redo lists
topic_specific_guidance.approach: Extra reinforcement, multiple explanations, hands-on practice, frequent assessment

topic_specific_guidance.action: Special attention required - learner struggled with these concepts
topic_specific_guidance.approach: Additional examples, alternative explanations, scaffolded practice
Review, practice, application in new contexts
